data.name: AbortStageOptionDescription
data.value: Abort at the end of a stage when any exception encountered from a stage runner. Default is not to abort at the end of a stage. This option, if used, must be used in conjunction with --no-abort.

data.name: ArgumentDelimiterOptionDescription
data.value: Specifies a delimiter for a multi-value argument. Default is a pipe (|) character.

data.name: ArgumentsOptionDescription
data.value: Arbitrary arguments that are passed through to stage runners. Format key=value. Multi-item values are accepted using a delimiter. Complex objects are supported by passing JSON string (use single quotes around the argument).

data.name: AssessVerbDescription
data.value: Runs only the stages associated with assessment: Discover, Parse, Analyze, Report.

data.name: AzurePrimaryRegionOptionDescription
data.value: Specifies the Azure Primary Region to use for resource template rendering, if the templates require the primary region.

data.name: AzureSecondaryRegionOptionDescription
data.value: Specifies the Azure Secondary Region to use for resource template rendering, if the templates require the secondary region as a paired region.

data.name: AzureSubscriptionIdOptionDescription
data.value: Specifies the Azure Subscription ID to use for resource template rendering, if the templates require the subscription ID.

data.name: AzureTargetOptionDescription
data.value: Azure Integration Services target environment: Consumption or Ise (Integration Service Environment).

data.name: ConversionPathOptionDescription
data.value: Path to store the converted output. Default is the working directory.

data.name: ConvertVerbDescription
data.value: Runs only the stages associated with conversion: Convert, Verify.

data.name: DeploymentEnvOptionDescription
data.value: Specifies the deployment environment to use for resource template rendering. Default is the 'dev' environment.

data.name: FindPathsOptionDescription
data.value: One or more paths to directories containing stage runners. Default find paths can be specified in the application configuration file (appsettings.json). This is an additive option, so paths specified in configuration file will be added to by paths specified on the command line.

data.name: FindPatternOptionDescription
data.value: Specify a search pattern for finding stage runner libraries. Use * (zero or more chars) and ? (exactly zero or one char) as wildcards. Default is "*.dll", however, this can be overridden in the application configuration file (appsettings.json).

data.name: MigrateVerbDescription
data.value: Runs all stages associated with migration: Discover, Parse, Analyze, Report, Convert, Verify.

data.name: ModelPathOptionDescription
data.value: Path to an exported model from a previous assessment.

data.name: NoAbortOptionDescription
data.value: Don't abort on first exception encountered from a stage runner and allow subsequent stage runners to continue to run. Default is false.

data.name: OutputModelPathDescription
data.value: Path to a file that will be created with the saved model. If the file already exists it will be overwritten.

data.name: SaveStageRunnerStateOptionDescription
data.value: Saves the runner execution state to disk before and after each stage runner.

data.name: SaveStageStateOptionDescription
data.value: Saves the runner execution state to disk before and after each stage.

data.name: StatePathOptionDescription
data.value: Path to store run state during execution of the tool. Default is the working directory.

data.name: TemplateConfigPathOptionDescription
data.value: Path to a directory containing the resource template configuration files. The configuration files are stored as Liquid templates and are rendered by the tool into YAML configuration files. Default is the working directory unless overridden by a value specified in the application configuration file (appsettings.json).

data.name: TemplatePathOptionDescription
data.value: One or more paths to directories containing the resource template files. The files are stored as Liquid templates and they represent individual artifacts used to build an AIS solution from the source application. The Liquid syntax is converted by the tool and the rendered output is stored in the conversion path. Default is the working directory unless overridden by a value specified in the application configuration file (appsettings.json).

data.name: UniqueDeploymentIdOptionDescription
data.value: Specify a unique value to be used in the resource name when generating Azure resources. Set this to a short value, such as an abbreviated company name. Default is a random string. Max length is {0} characters.

data.name: VerboseLevelOptionDescription
data.value: Specifies the level of verbose logging, if verbose logging is switched on using the -v option. Use '-' for minimum trace output and '+' for full trace logging. Default is '-'.

data.name: VerifyVerbDescription
data.value: Runs only the stages associated with verification: Verify.

data.name: WorkingPathOptionDescription
data.value: Change the current working directory to a different path for the tool execution. Default is current directory. This option will affect any relative paths specified in other options.
